alert.note: Alert for Santa Fe Metro Area; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 25 at 2:12PM MST until February 26 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 8 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Fe Metro Area and West Central Highlands. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 8 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow or blowing dust could suddenly reduce visibilities at times.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Santa Fe Metro Area; West Central Highlands
